channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: Netflixによると、同社のサービスにおけるゲームへのユーザー関与は2023年に3倍になり、『グランド・セフト・オート』はこれまでで最も成功したローンチとなった（Pranav Dixit/Engadget）
item.description:
Pranav Dixit / Engadget:
Netflix says user engagement with games on its service tripled in 2023 and Grand Theft Auto has become its most successful launch to date  —  The company added the Grand Theft Auto trilogy to its offerings late in the year.  —  Netflix said that user engagement with games on the service tripled in 2023.

item.title: 英国政府が委託した調査によると、BBCはオンライン・ローカルニュース提供において「商業プロバイダーの1対1の代替」にはなっていない（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
Study commissioned by the UK government says the BBC does not serve as a “one-to one substitute for commercial providers in online local news provision”  —  Ofcom will publish annual report on BBC position in local news sector.  —  The BBC's online local news output does not add up to a …

item.title: Netflixの共同CEOであるテッド・サランドスは、WWEとの契約は2024年に予想されるコンテンツへの170億ドルの支出の "範囲内 "であり、Netflixのスポーツ戦略の変更ではないと語っている（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Netflix co-CEO Ted Sarandos says the WWE deal “fits within” its anticipated $17B spending on content in 2024 and is not a change to Netflix's sports strategy  —  Netflix extended its lead as the world's biggest premium video-streaming platform — pulling in a better …

item.title: ネットフリックスは、「リニア資産」の買収には興味がなく、さらなるM&Aによって「競争環境が大きく変わる」とは考えていないと述べている（Peter White/Deadline）
item.description:
Peter White / Deadline:
Netflix says it's not interested in acquiring “linear assets”, and it does not believe further M&A will “materially change the competitive environment”  —  Netflix is often talked about a potential buyer for big Hollywood studios as the latest set of M&A rumors swirl …

item.title: Netflixは、広告付きプランが利用可能な一部の国で、広告なしのベーシック・プランを廃止することを検討していると発表した。
item.description:
Emma Roth / The Verge:
Netflix says it's looking to retire its ad-free Basic plan in some countries where ad-supported plans are available, starting with Canada and the UK in Q2  —  Although Netflix no longer allows new or returning members to sign up for the ad-free Basic subscription that costs $11.99 per month …

item.title: メモタイムCEOが複数の部門にわたる削減を発表、同社は「熱心に」経費を削減したが「まだやるべきことがある」と語る（Max Tani/@maxwelltani）
item.description:
Max Tani / @maxwelltani:
Memo: Time CEO announces cuts across several departments and says the company has “diligently reduced” expenses but “there is still more work to be done”  —  Memo to staff from Time magazine CEO Jess Sibley announcing the cuts, saying the company has “diligently reduced our expenses” but “there is still more work to be done.” [image]

item.title: ネットフリックス、第4四半期の売上高は前年同期比12.5％増の$88.3B、予想$87.1B、世界有料会員数は12.8％増の2億6,628万人、純利益は5,500万ドルから9億3,800万ドルへ（Sarah Whitten/CNBC）
item.description:
Sarah Whitten / CNBC:
Netflix reports Q4 revenue up 12.5% YoY to $8.83B vs. $8.71B est., global paid memberships up 12.8% to 260.28M vs. 256M est., net income of $938M, up from $55M  —  - Netflix added 13.1 million subscribers during the fourth quarter.  — The company now has 260.8 million paid subscribers.

item.title: タウンホールでリーチCEOは、紙媒体の販売減少について「不都合な真実」に直面しなければならないが、デジタルへのシフトは収益を安定させると語った（Mark Sweney/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Mark Sweney / The Guardian:
At a town hall, Reach CEO says staff have to face the “inconvenient truth” over its declining sale of print titles, but shift to digital will stabilize revenue  —  Reach chief tells staff to face ‘inconvenient truth’ over print but says digital will stabilise profitability

item.title: 1971年にCBSニュースに入社し、CBSサンデーモーニングのキャスターを22年間務め、ラジオのコメンテーターとして数十年を過ごしたチャールズ・オスグッド氏が91歳で死去（CBSニュース）
item.description:
CBS News:
Charles Osgood, who joined CBS News in 1971, anchored CBS Sunday Morning for 22 years, and spent decades as a radio commentator, dies at age 91  —  Award-winning journalist Charles Osgood, who anchored “CBS Sunday Morning” for 22 years and was host of the long-running radio program “The Osgood File,” died Tuesday at home in New Jersey.

item.title: タトゥー・アーティストがマイルス・デイヴィスの写真に墨を入れた際、著作権法に違反したかどうかを判断する裁判が火曜日に始まる。
item.description:
Bill Donahue / Billboard:
A trial to determine whether a tattoo artist violated copyright law when she inked a photo of Miles Davis begins Tuesday, a case impacted by SCOTUS' Warhol case  —  A jury is set to decided whether celebrity tattoo artist Kat Von D infringed intellectual property by using a copyrighted photo of Davis as the basis for a tattoo.

item.title: The 19th は、全国、地域、地方出版社のグループであるThe 19th News Networkを立ち上げ、再出版、共同作業、リソースの共有などを行う。
item.description:
The 19th:
The 19th launches The 19th News Network, a group of national, regional, and local publishers who'll be able to republish, collaborate, share resources, and more  —  The new collective will elevate the work of partner publishers while also establishing more pathways for collaboration across organizations.

item.title: ロサンゼルス・タイムズ紙が少なくとも115人、つまり報道部門の20％以上をレイオフすると発表、年間3000万～4000万ドルの損失を理由に（Meg James/Los Angeles Times）
item.description:
Meg James / Los Angeles Times:
The Los Angeles Times announces it is laying off at least 115 people, or more than 20% of the newsroom, citing annual losses of $30M-$40M  —  The Los Angeles Times announced Tuesday that it was laying off at least 115 people — or more than 20% of the newsroom — marking …

item.title: アイルランドの独立系出版社メディアハウズは、年間400万ユーロのコスト削減を達成するため、従業員数を10%削減しようとしている。
item.description:
Donal O'Donovan / Independent.ie:
Irish independent publisher Mediahuis seeks to reduce headcount by ~10% to achieve cost saving of €4M per year; it employs around 549 in its publishing division  —  Staffing levels will be reduced by around 10pc as shift from print to digital continues.

item.title: ネットフリックス、2025年に米国、カナダ、中南米などで放映される「ロー」などWWE番組の独占放映権を購入、申請：10年契約で50億ドル以上の価値（CNBC）
item.description:
CNBC:
Netflix buys the exclusive rights to WWE programs like Raw, airing in 2025 in the US, Canada, Latin America, and more; filing: the 10-year deal is worth $5B+  —  - Netflix and TKO Group Holdings said Tuesday that the streaming platform will air the WWE's flagship program Raw starting next year.

item.title: アカデミー賞のドキュメンタリー部門にノミネートされた「20 Days in Mariupol」（ジェイク・コイル/Associated Press）。
item.description:
Jake Coyle / Associated Press:
The Associated Press receives its first Oscar nomination in history, with 20 Days in Mariupol nominated for best documentary at the Academy Awards  —  Associated Press video journalist Mstyslav Chernov covered the first 20 days of the Russian invasion of the Ukrainian city of Mariupol.
